tool_description: Generates demand forecasts for products across locations using historical sales data and seasonal patterns to support inventory planning decisions.

product_skus.description: Product SKUs to forecast demand for

forecast_horizon_days.description: Number of days to forecast ahead (7-365)

historical_data_days.description: Days of historical data to use for forecasting (30-730)

seasonality_adjustment.description: Whether to apply seasonal adjustments to forecasts

error_messages: Insufficient historical data: Need at least 30 days of sales history for reliable forecasting. Reduce historical_data_days or check data availability.
Invalid forecast horizon: forecast_horizon_days must be between 7 and 365 days.
Product data unavailable: Some product_skus have no sales history. Remove SKUs with no data or use alternative forecasting methods.
Location mismatch: Some location_ids have no sales data for the specified products. Verify location-product combinations.
Confidence level out of range: confidence_level must be between 0.8 and 0.99.
usage: Specify product_skus, location_ids, and forecast_horizon_days. Adjust historical_data_days based on data availability and seasonality_adjustment for seasonal products. Use higher confidence_level for critical inventory decisions.

demand_forecasts.description: Detailed demand predictions per product-location combination

forecast_accuracy_score.description: Overall accuracy score of the forecasting model (0-1)

seasonal_factors.description: Seasonal adjustment factors applied to base forecasts
